title: How Do I Handle Debt in Collections? (Hour 3)
description:
Dave Ramsey, Ken Coleman, & George Kamel celebrate the 30th Anniversary of the show and discuss:

Getting back in the job market as a recent widow,

Selling a house to pay off debt,

Dealing with debt in collection.


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6

Learn more about your ad choices. https://www.megaphone.fm/adchoices
Ramsey Solutions Privacy Policy
